coreAttributes.name: ear cuff chain studs
coreAttributes.description: A pair of stud earrings, each one of which is connected to an ear cuff by means of thin chains.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(clip)] the stud earrings into [npc.her] [npc.ears], before attaching the cuffs to [npc.her] upper [npc.ears] and allowing the chains to hang loose.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(clip)] the stud earrings into [npc2.namePos] [npc2.ears], before attaching the cuffs to [npc2.her] upper [npc2.ears] and allowing the chains to hang loose.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(clip)] the stud earrings into [npc2.namePos] [npc2.ears], before attaching the cuffs to [npc2.her] upper [npc2.ears] and allowing the chains to hang loose.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unclip)] [npc.her] stud earrings and [npc.verb(take)] them out, before removing the cuffs.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unclip)] [npc2.namePos] stud earrings and [npc.verb(take)] them out, before removing the cuffs.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unclip)] [npc2.namePos] stud earrings and roughly [npc.verb(pull)] them out, before removing the cuffs.
